overview:
Diallo Group, LLC is a privately held alternative investment company that manages hedge funds and other pooled investment vehicles. They also provide investment advisory services to high net worth individuals, corporations, sovereign wealth funds, municipal entities, endowments, fund of funds and charitable organizations.

The firm employs multiple strategies to create its portfolio. Depending on the funds purity of style, Diallo Group fund managers will exercise a macro approach to sector selection in combination with fundamental and technical analysis for individual investments. The Diallo Group is based in Bloomfield Hills, Michigan.
